about_the_game:
This Is R-18 Monster Girls Artbook

45 wide pages full colored
11 Unique Monster Girls
12 HCG

Intro

Eastern region; nearly half of the entire region, is inhabited by humans. Western region is said to be where exiles traveled astray until they meet their ill-timed fate. However, being an exile is somewhat not a dreadful fate, as they have chance to witness the new wonder of beautiful, otherworldly creatures, known as Siluman. Humans are constantly fooled by rumors on what cruel, sadistic, bloodthirsty, man-devouring creature Siluman be. In existence, most of them are lovely and intimate creatures which inherited natural beauty and blessing of the nature itself. One is able to spread its wings and soar daintily amongst the blooming flowers. On the other hand, one is an embodiment of the great nature itself, where it’s granted for each step will turn even barren wastelands into lush woods. Despite their lack of curiosity and advanced knowledge compared to humans, Siluman’s beauty never fades as they age, even until their untimely death.

What other astonishments will Siluman provide as feast to your eyes? You shall soon uncover their true form.

content_descriptors.notes: This is an full colored adult artbook of monster girls

name: Codex Libido : Mundus

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None
